Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Southbound Reroute near Jackson/Wells
ShortDescription: SB 126 Jackson buses are rerouted via Jackson, Franklin, Monroe, La Salle, and will continue over the regular route due to street blockage near Jackson/Wells.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Franklin, Monroe, La Salle, and will continue over the regular route due to street blockage near Jackson/Wells.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dempster-Skokie
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing at Dempster-Skokie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing at Dempster-Skokie due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #97 Skokie buses.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
